short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add links on your ScoreSaber user profile to quickly rate songs on BeastSaber.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds links to your ScoreSaber user profiles so that you can rate the songs on the BeastSaber site. 

To get started find your profile on https://scoresaber.com, once you go to your user profile you will see links below the song titles. 

This will do a search on BeastSaber and you can click the correct song map and scroll down to rate.  I will add more links to other sites later and update this extension.
